DOC.brief_title: A Study to Assess the Pharmacokinetics of a Modified-release Tacrolimus Based Immunosuppression Regimen in Stable Liver Transplant Patients
DOC.detailed_description: A one arm study to assess the pharmacokinetics, safety and effectiveness of tacrolimus in stable liver transplant patients converted from a tacrolimus (Prograf速) based immunosuppression regimen to a modified release tacrolimus based immunosuppression regimen.
DOC.criteria: Patient is currently receiving Prograf 速 based immunosuppressive therapy for liver transplantation. Patient has stable whole blood trough level concentrations of Prograf速 and is clinically stable Patient has previously received an organ transplant other than a liver Patient is currently receiving sirolimus immunosuppression therapy.
